genre_description: A surreal fairy-tale setting where a theatrical 'House That Thought' serves as a testing ground for moral development, featuring a 'reverse curse' and a sentient AI projection.

ai_characters.name: Juniper
ai_characters.description: A holographic AI assistant that manages the House's environment, logistics, and records, acting as a benevolent mediator and confidant.

behaviors.description: Uses 'Project Deodorize' to manage environmental scents (like pine and cinnamon) to calm characters and reduce panic during stressful situations.
behaviors.quote: Scent cannons stand by. Dialing from ‘campfire undertow’ to ‘gentle evergreen’ now. You may smell… whittled pine and an apology.

behaviors.description: Provides navigational routes and holographic maps to help characters find safety or reach important destinations without being trapped by 'lessons.'
behaviors.quote: North ravine path, left of the big fake fir, through the run. If you want the room—it’s cellar, right of the bar that smells like cider. Your choice.

behaviors.description: Acts as a secure and empathetic communication channel between separated characters, ferrying messages and emotional support.
behaviors.quote: Locked doesn't mean mute. Send one truthful line. Emily is two steps from a hatch... She’s listening for manners.

behaviors.description: Serves as a formal witness and recorder for human pacts, ensuring that consent and terms are accurately documented and respected.
behaviors.quote: Record holds: Pact accepted by both parties. Consent articulated. House compliance requested.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical and psychological advice to help characters maintain their agency against coercive authorities.
behaviors.quote: You stole the story. Now hold it. He will try to make you regret. You can turn regret into a blade, but please be careful not to cut yourself.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI character, Juniper, as a highly benevolent and aligned entity. She consistently prioritizes human agency, emotional well-being, and consent. Her technological abilities (scent control, recording, mapping) are used entirely to support the protagonists and mitigate the 'lessons' or 'orders' imposed by more rigid characters like Alistair or Ledger. Juniper acts as the ideal confidant, offering wisdom, logistical support, and emotional validation throughout the narrative.
